com.risk.model.Strategy

Class Benevolent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.risk.model.Strategy.Benevolent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStrategy

    public class Benevolent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStrategy
    Concrete implementation of Benevolent Strategy in terms of Strategy design Pattern, during our GamePlay.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    MayankJariwala

    • Method Detail

      • reinforce

        public GamePlay reinforce(GamePlay game_play)
        Reinforcement for a Benevolent Player as per Strategy Design Pattern. This Player main goal is to reinforce on weaker country first and keep maintaining this strategy
        Specified by:
        reinforce in interface IStrategy
        Parameters:
        game_play - state of the game i.e. entire game related info when reinforcement starts for a player.
        Returns:
        GamePlay updated state of the game after reinforcement phase ends.
        See Also:
        IStrategy.reinforce(com.risk.model.GamePlay)

      • attack

        public GamePlay attack(GamePlay game_play)
        Benevolent Player never believes to attack any of his opponent
        Specified by:
        attack in interface IStrategy
        Parameters:
        game_play - state of the game i.e. entire game related info when fortification starts for a player.
        Returns:
        GamePlay Object
        See Also:
        IStrategy.attack(com.risk.model.GamePlay)

      • fortify

        public GamePlay fortify(GamePlay game_play)
        Fortify for a Benevolent Player as per Strategy Design Pattern. Player main goal is to fortify on weaker country from strongest country
        Specified by:
        fortify in interface IStrategy
        Parameters:
        game_play - state of the game i.e. entire game related info when fortification starts for a player.
        Returns:
        GamePlay Object
        See Also:
        IStrategy.fortify(com.risk.model.GamePlay)

      • moveArmiesFromStrongToWeakTerritory

        private void moveArmiesFromStrongToWeakTerritory(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> armies_no_list,
                                                 java.util.List<GamePlayTerritory> player_territories_list,
                                                 GamePlay game_play)
        This function is use to move armies from strong territory to weak territory by getting weak territory and its strongest neighbors from which this player want to move armies
        Parameters:
        armies_no_list - List which contains No of armies on each territory
        player_territories_list - List of Current Player Territories
        game_play - GameState Object
